system.description:
An incantation mixed with three mudra that speak of swiftness, cutting, and endings. The target of this benefit is imbued with the speed of an unsheathing sword.
An advanced technique that is hard to perfect but unfortunately is probably the most important ability of all Bladeweavers. This is a favorite of Master Samasida, a wily hermit found in the island of Bakara near the Ruins of Samrasat, where he studies with wandering souls of that ancient civilization.

When you make a melee attack,choose 1 ally in range 3 (or yourself). They gain 1 Tiyempo. When they gain 3 Tiyempo, they immediately gain Haste for the next Strike. While they have Haste, they move first in a Strike, before any other fighter.

At Strike 3+, spend 1 Beat to can activate Minor Liberation. Every time you Stride, Move, or Rush, you may teleport that much instead. At Strike 4+, inflict1 True Hit on every enemy in the battlefield when you teleport.

If you are Defeated while you have Minor Liberation Activated, you vanish from reality, unravelling from material.
